title: Looking for a team to play clash with regually
body: I'm looking for a team that wants to play clash whenever its on, I'm happy to play any role or lane and to practice when able to. I'm happy to play any role and am currently gold 2 on main.

replies.body:
I am Silver II on main, I know it's a little low but really wanting to improve. 
I main Nasus top and Rammus jng
Other Champions I play are: Tryndamere, Yi, Jax
If we have another 3 people that are willing to join I'm cool with it. Rank doesn't really matter right now as practising playing as a team will mean more than solo que
